mapper.select: SELECT FLOOR(STAT_DT/100) AS STAT_MO,B_MARK,ORDER_TYPE,COUNT(ORDER_ID) AS ORDER_CNT, SUM(ORDER_PROFIT) AS ORDER_PROFIT, SUM(CASE WHEN `REFUND_FLAG`='REFUND' THEN `ORDER_CHARGE` ELSE 0 END) AS REFUND_AMOUNT FROM TO_E_ORDER_DTL_D WHERE STAT_DT >= #{statDt} AND STAT_DT < #{endDt} and order_type in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) GROUP BY FLOOR(STAT_DT/100),B_MARK,ORDER_TYPE;
